import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import axios from 'axios' const Registration = () => { const [userData, setUserData] = useState() const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm(); const onSubmit = data => setUserData(data) const postData = async() =>{ console.log(userData) const name = userData.name; const sirname = userData.sirname const email = userData.email const password = userData.password const confirmPassword = userData.pwdrepeat axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/inscrire',{ sirname: sirname, name:name, email:email, password: password, confirmPassword: confirmPassword }).then(() =>{ alert("success") }) } useEffect(() =>{ postData() },[userData]) return (

Pas Encore Inscrit? Connectez-vous Maintenant.

) } export default Registration;
